attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
The government has repeatedly bypassed due process by implementing tougher restrictions on the population without debate within parliament. 
The government has shown hypocrisy in the implementation of local lockdowns by refusing to implement lockdowns in their own constituency despite higher infection rates.
By allowing schools and universities to remain open allowed the infection rate to rise leading to restrictions stopping families and support bubbles from meeting causing mental stress
attributes.background: To debate a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
